feed.title: Formbricks Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(env): add new env variables by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4959
  • chore(terraform): fix by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4963
  • fix: google sheet integration error message by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4899
  • fix: updated docker file with redis and minio containers by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4909
  • fix: Fix Android build setting by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4967
  • docs: tweak docs for sso by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4974
  • docs: Remove duplicate titles for better SEO by @harshsbhat in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4962
  • fix: changed 'Download example CSV'-link to a button by @jakobsitory in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4975
  • chore(infra-updates): updates and fixes to helm chart & terraform modules by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4976
  • fix: Harden GitHub Actions by @step-security-bot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4982
  • feat: optional cron jobs check by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4966
  • chore: determine formbricks version on release by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4985

New Contributors

  • @jakobsitory made their first contribution in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4975

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.4.0...v3.4.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Android build fixes by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4984
  • feat: add custom TTL for cache records by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4912
  • docs: Missing page descriptions. by @harshsbhat in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4980
  • feat: added qr code feature by @Paribesh01 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4951
  • fix(helm-chart): missing envFrom when using secret.enabled by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4992
  • fix: handling invalid csv files by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4991
  • chore: Refactored the intercom next public env variable and added test files by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4960
  • chore: js-core sdk refactor by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4815
  • chore: updates to aws cloud resources by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4996

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.4.1...v3.5.0

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: removed XM & Survey -> SAML SSO by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4999
  • feat: personalized survey links backend preparations by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4870
  • docs: add enterprise hint for all EE features in docs by @harshsbhat in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5000
  • chore(observability): add observability tools permissions by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5003
  • fix: layout breaking when adding note to response by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5007
  • fix: Android build changes + close survey window on js exception by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5016
  • fix: single use link generation by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5004
  • fix: recall in email embed by @Dhruwang in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4971
  • fix: add membership checks in [environmentId] route by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5020
  • chore(terraform): fix terraform certs by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5023

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.5.0...v3.5.1

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: role escalation in org settings by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4901
  • release: pre steps switch from vercel to aws by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5030
  • feat: adds configurable logging by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4914
  • chore: small email tweaks by @harshsbhat in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5019
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 3 directories with 1 update by @dependabot in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5035

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.5.1...v3.6.0

entry.title: New release for Formbricks: v3.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Trust server in the iOS webview to allow to load the survey package by @vaxi87 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5024
  • docs: add prometheus to monitoring docs by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5042
  • chore(actions): Update github actions to follow new release pattern by @d3vb0ox in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5037
  • fix: refactored the code to create a new link on click for single-use link surveys by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5038
  • fix: adds missing storage api docs and fixes api key auth docs by @pandeymangg in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5031
  • fix: add membership checks in remaining routes by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5026
  • chore: added new script with onload by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4987
  • fix: invite user bug by @gupta-piyush19 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5043
  • chore: Refactored the Posthog next public env variable and added test files by @victorvhs017 in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4961
  • docs: add EE feature to list by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5051
  • fix: tweak password reset ux by @jobenjada in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5049
  • fix: Github release action unable to access secrets by @mattinannt in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/5052

Full Changelog: https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/compare/v3.6.0...v3.6.1
